entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, who is about to go through the trapdoor.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's, who is given a flute to play and put the dog asleep.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who is left behind at the top of the trapdoor.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard, to whom Hedwig will be sent if anything happens to Harry.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl, who is tasked with delivering a message to Dumbledore.

entities.name: the dog
entities.description: A dog that is put asleep by Hermione playing the flute.

entities.name: hermione's flute
entities.description: The flute given to Hermione to play and put the dog asleep.

relationships.description: Harry handed the flute over to Hermione.
Harry warned Ron not to follow him if anything happens.
Hermione put the dog asleep by playing the flute.
Hedwig will deliver a message to Dumbledore if anything happens to Harry.
